name: Egg Baguette
description:
Objective

See how far you can hit the egg

Controls

  1. Press SPACE to drop the egg
  2. Press SPACE to swing the baguette
  3.  Hold SPACE to fast forward time (the egg starts in slow mo)

The SPACE key is also used to start and restart the game

Main features (so far)

  • Use of a physics engine
  • A camera that tracks an object's movement
  • Ability to fast forward time
  • Tying the sounds and animations to collisions and the anticipation of collisions
  • The volume of the music changes based on the distance to the sea

Credits

  • Design and Development by Game Faorites
  • Artwork by Game Favorites
  • Audio by multiple creators (see below)

Licensed background music - by JuliusH from Pixabay

Development Details

This game was made using Construct 3 and it was made for round 6 out of 7 in the GDKO 2022 game jam where the task was to create a one button game with the theme: Audio
